name: MangaRock - Dark Theme
additional_info:
Notes (22/08/2019):

- Changed more stuffed i forgot or didn't know about to DARK.

- Top Picks For You is looking a little bit better now.

- Change manga reader's background to black ( Thank you for the suggestion Scud !! ) 

!!! If some pages appear without image in horizontal mode, that's because ads were supposed to appear there.

                       ======================================================

Notes (02/07/2019):

- Changed more stuffed i forgot or didn't know about to DARK.

- Fixed height of pages in horizontal mode to fit 100% height.

!!! If some pages appear without image in horizontal mode, that's because ads were supposed to appear there.
